name: GreetMyGuest
0:
”Alexa, Launch My Greeter”
”Ask my greeter to add my guest”
”Ask my greeter to greet my guest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my greeter
des: This skill enables you to create personalised messages for each and every guest according to their name, their relationship with you, and also their nature.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
